Text: Confirm your subscription and get your first chance to save This message is brought to you for EMSi by YesMail We appreciate your membership To modify your YesMail account please see Member Services below VALUABLE SAVINGS ON THE PRODUCTS YOU LOVE RIGHT TO YOUR INBOX As part of your relationship with EMSi you asked to receive special offers from EMSi and its partners And now EMSi and YesMail have teamed up to bring you valuable offers and promotions relevant to your interests Simply click here reaspCPE to confirm your subscription to YesMail and youll get your first great offer from YesMail FREE SOFTWARE from brand names like SEGA IBM and EA Sports With highquality merchants relevant offers and convenient online access YesMail brings the deals youve been searching for right to your inbox What could be easier Thanks EMSi and YesMail Please visit the above Web site to verify offer availability outside the United States MEMBER SERVICES To unsubscribe from YesMail just send an email to with the word unsubscribe in the subject line
